newsitem.title: USA: LodgeNet closer to hotel room game patent.
newsitem.headline: LodgeNet closer to hotel room game patent.

text.p: LodgeNet Entertainment Corp said Tuesday it received notice of allowance from the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office for its interactive video game system for hotels.

The company said the technology will allow video games to be played in hotel rooms using a proprietary network that eliminates the need for video game processors in each room. LodgeNet said it currently provides video game services in more than 322,000 installed guest rooms.
The patent is expected to be issued in due course, LodgeNet said.
LodgeNet is a specialized communications company. Its shares were trading down 5/8 Tuesday at 15-1/8.
